page.title: 12LANGUAGE
page.content: IN THE{BRUNTON}AREA,EVERYONE USES {SCOTTISH}WORDS OR HAS A{FIFE} ACCENT.SOME OF THE UNUSUAL WORDS WERE{TATTIEBOGLE}FOR{SCARECROW}AND { {MUCKLE}FOR{BIG.}THE COMMON WORDS WERE{ {TATTIES}FOR{POTATOES,BURN}FOR{STREAM} AND{KIRK }FOR{CHURCH.}HERE IS A SENTENCE WITH{SCOTTISH}WORDS IN IT. THE{SHILPIT LASS}DONNED A{PEENY}TO PEEL THE{TATTIES}WHICH WERE{HOWKED} FROM{ASIDE}THE{BURN.}THIS IS THE SENTENCE TRANSLATED. THE{THIN}AND{DRAWN GIRL}PUT ON AN {APRON}TO PEEL THE{POTATOES}WHICH WERE {DUG}FROM{BESIDE}THE{STREAM.
